net.alevel.asteroids.game.objects.shapes

Class MeshGen

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.alevel.asteroids.game.objects.shapes.MeshGen

  • public class MeshGen
extends Object
    Creates different shapes.
    NOTE: when used in a GameObject, the position attribute refers to the position of the centre of the shape
